title: How to Enable Cortana Outside Its Supported Countries

steps.headline: Launch the Start menu.
steps.description: Click the Windows icon at the bottom left of your screen or hit the ⊞ Win key (Windows icon) on your keyboard.

steps.headline: Select the Settings gear from the lower left corner.
Go to the Time & language category.
Select Region & language from the left pane.
Open the dropdown menu under the "Country or region" header.
Choose one of the countries that Cortana supports.
steps.description:
Here is a list:
Australia
Brazil
Canada
China
France
Germany
India
Italy
Japan
Mexico
Spain
United Kingdom
United States

steps.headline: Use Cortana.
steps.description: Cortana has been enabled on your computer and is ready for use.

text:
Launch the Start menu. Click the Windows icon at the bottom left of your screen or hit the ⊞ Win key (Windows icon) on your keyboard. Select the Settings gear from the lower left corner.  Go to the Time & language category.  Select Region & language from the left pane.  Open the dropdown menu under the "Country or region" header.  Choose one of the countries that Cortana supports. Here is a list:
Australia
Brazil
Canada
China
France
Germany
India
Italy
Japan
Mexico
Spain
United Kingdom
United States Use Cortana. Cortana has been enabled on your computer and is ready for use.
